title: Change in method of winner choosing
body: Lottery is wonderful feature to earn cakes. However, there has been situations where no one was able to match all 6 numbers and 5 numbers correctly.  I think Lottery winning numbers must be chosen from the tickets which have been sold. This way more people will be able to win Cakes.
choices: No, the present method is good and no need to make any change.
author: 0x26C7A8d4a003299534bc889D9dbFF78eC5DB1640
